name: Streamworks International SA
tag_list: video-management-system, digital-media, streaming-companies, multi-media, live-streaming, video-encoding, vods, video-on-demand, streaming
overview:
Streamworks is the global streaming company that delivers unrivalled streaming experiences across any network to any device. Through its patented technology for live and on-demand video, Streamworks already work with frontline breaking news, sport and entertainment brands at the forefront of the video-anywhere revolution, providing a fully managed service for live and on-demand video that saves, on average over 30% bandwidth.

Streamworks further enhances the video anywhere experience with social tools and interactive web environments that bring people closer to the action.

As a one-stop solution for vCommerce, Streamworks helps brands increase video consumption and drive monetization. From video acquisition, encoding and content distribution to embedded players, live ad serving and full data analytics Streamworks applies a broadcast approach to streaming media, redefining the way in which consumers and brands interact, increasing overall video consumption and drive consumer engagement.

Streamworks work with some of the biggest brands around including Associated Press, FIA World Rally Championship, LTA Davies Cup, Major League Gaming and Jamie Oliver.
